name: Moar Coins!
description:
Simple arcade game where you must stop enemies before they get to the bottom of the screen. Shooting costs coins so you need to use your mouse (while moving and shooting) to keep adding ammo.

A/D to move left and right. W to shoot. Mouse to pick coins and insert them. R to restart.

Made in under one hour game for 1h game jam (http://onehourgamejam.com/)

@ludipe
